CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 1, 1954, pg. 10, reads: "Recital - Joseph W. Grider, head of the music department at West Virginia State College, was presented in recital last Sunday, April 25, by Marie Carter Hayes in a magnificent concert which ended the musical season in Pittsburgh. Pictured top, the receiving line at the reception which followed the recital.  Left to right: Mr. Grider, his wife, Mrs. Grider, who accompanied him to Pittsburgh; Mrs. Harriet Lewis, Mrs. Rebecca Carter and Mrs. Emma Davis... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of receiving line with Joseph W. Girder, Mrs. Girder, Harriet Lewis, Rebecca Carter, and Emma Davis, posed for piano recital by Grider in Hayes School of Music, 6490 Frankstown Avenue, East Liberty
